tool_description: Evaluates borrower's employment history, job stability, and income consistency to assess employment-related credit risk factors.

job_changes_5y.description: Number of job changes in last 5 years

error_messages: Invalid employment duration: current_job_months and total_work_experience must be non-negative.
Inconsistent employment data: Current job months cannot exceed total work experience.
Excessive job changes: Number of job changes seems unreasonable for the time period.
Invalid industry classification: Industry must be a recognized sector if provided.
usage: Provide current_job_months and total_work_experience, optionally include job_changes_5y and industry. Returns employment stability assessment.

job_tenure_rating.description: Current job tenure rating: excellent, good, fair, poor

career_progression.description: Career development pattern: advancing, stable, declining

industry_risk_level.description: Industry stability risk: low, medium, high
